ALAS2-2023-2120

Amazon Linux 2 Security Advisory: ALAS-2023-2120
Advisory Release Date: 2023-07-17 17:39 Pacific
Advisory Updated Date: 2023-07-19 22:26 Pacific
Severity: Important
References: CVE-2023-37328 
FAQs regarding Amazon Linux ALAS/CVE Severity
Issue Overview:

Heap overwrite in subtitle parsing (CVE-2023-37328)


Affected Packages:

gstreamer1-plugins-base


Issue Correction:
Run yum update gstreamer1-plugins-base to update your system.

New Packages:
aarch64:
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.aarch64
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-tools-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.aarch64
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-devel-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.aarch64
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-debuginfo-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.aarch64

i686:
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.i686
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-tools-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.i686
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-devel-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.i686
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-debuginfo-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.i686

src:
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.src

x86_64:
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.x86_64
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-tools-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.x86_64
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-devel-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.x86_64
    gstreamer1-plugins-base-debuginfo-1.18.4-5.amzn2.0.2.x86_64
